articles.author: Nimi Princewill
articles.title: Trump wants to talk business with Africa in hopes of countering China. But a US summit excludes Africa’s big players - CNN
articles.description: The White House is hosting an “African leaders” summit of sorts this week. But only five countries from the continent of more than 50 nations are welcome to join.
articles.content:
The White House is hosting an African leaders summit of sorts this week. But only five countries from the continent of more than 50 nations are welcome to join.

articles.author: Olivia Kemp
articles.title: First malaria drug for newborns and young infants expected to be approved in Africa within weeks - CNN
articles.description: The approval of the first malaria treatment for newborns and young infants could lead to imminent widespread use in Africa, drugmaker Novartis said Tuesday.
articles.content:
The approval of the first malaria treatment for newborns and young infants could lead to imminent widespread use in Africa, drugmaker Novartis said Tuesday.
